title: jok3rz0r
author: jok3rz0r
content: AUMA FREE NFT GENERATORA revolution in the NFT world, AUMA introduces technology that allowstoday's artists to significantly reduce their work!#1 - InterfaceConvenient and fuctional design, Unlimited possibilities for creativityThe best app for NFT artists right now, user-friendly UX,beautiful UI. Extensive functionality and constant updates!#2 - AdvantagesInfinite combinationsUpload your layers and randomise themUniversalityThe universal app is suitable for both art and 3DUniquenessUnique in its kind, no analogues#3 - PricesNo other variants, Absolutely free!Get Premium Access while it's free!We give you - the artists - the opportunity to reach your full potential for free in our app. We don't charge anything for it.Our website: https://auma.app/

comments.author: thikachhey
comments.body: Is there any doc or video on how to setup? Cannot figure out from the downloaded files.

comments.author: jok3rz0r
comments.body: The project is still very new, a video overview of the functionality will be available in about 2 weeks. You just need to download the archive from the website and run the installer, then choose where to save the application and wait for installation.

comments.author: modewei
comments.body: What is the password to open the file?
